resources.string:
DuckDuckGo for Mac has the speed you need, the browser features you expect, and comes packed with our best-in-class privacy essentials.

On your Mac, go to:
duckduckgo.com/mac

Ready to start browsing privately on Mac?

Visit this URL on your Mac to download:
duckduckgo.com/mac
You won\'t need to share any personal information to join the waitlist. You\'ll secure your place in line with a timestamp that exists solely on your device so we can notify you when it\'s your turn.
